boys.name: Big Barry
boys.description: Barry's biceps are as big as his heart. He doesn't just lift weights, he lifts spirits. Every flex is a promise of victory.

skill.name: Flex of Power
skill.effect: Increases Power by 10% at the start of battle. 50% chance to attract next enemy attack.

boys.name: Rocky Ralph
boys.description: Ralph's fists hit harder than his killer one-liners. He’s a one-man rock band, and every punch is a solo.

boys.name: Gentle George
boys.description: Underneath his massive frame beats the heart of a poet. But don’t be fooled, when George gets serious, enemies feel every stanza.

skill.name: Poetic Justice
skill.effect: Heals 10% of damage dealt to himself or a random ally.

boys.name: Tough Tony
boys.description: Tony doesn't just fight; he outlasts. Every hit he takes only makes him stronger. He's the wall you didn’t know you needed.

boys.name: Slick Sam
boys.description: Sam’s quick on his feet and slick in his moves. His charm can disarm any foe, and his strikes leave a lasting impression.

skill.name: Shadow Strike
skill.effect: 25% chance to hit a second random enemy for 50% damage.
